constraints.name: speed_upper_bound_constraint
constraints.description: 速度上限约束，速度 V 不能超过 20000

constraints.name: minimum_distance_constraint
constraints.description: 曼哈顿距离收敛约束，必须在有限步内使当前坐标与目标坐标的曼哈顿距离为 0

constraints.name: path_reachability
constraints.description: 位置可达性约束，必须在移动后精确到达目标坐标 (X, Y)，而不仅仅是经过该点上方

constraints.name: direction_change_constraint
constraints.description: 方向变化约束，每一步只能选择左转、右转或保持当前方向

result.description: 构造一个路径使得从起点到达目标点

objective.description: 构造一个路径使得从起点到达目标点

invariant.name: monotonic_sequence_property

result.name: monotonic_sequence_property
